text: Hedley was a Canadian pop rock band formed in Abbotsford, British Columbia in 2003. == Previous members == * Jacob Hoggard – lead vocals, guitar, piano (2003–2018) * Dave Rosin – guitar, backing vocals (2005–2018) * Tommy Mac – bass, backing vocals (2005–2018) * Jay Benison – drums (2017–2018) * Chris Crippin – drums (2005–2017) * Ryan Federau – guitar (2003–2005) * Kevin Giesbrecht – guitar (2003–2005) * Kevin Heeres – bass (2003–2005) * Brandon McKay – drums (2003–2005) ==Discography== *Hedley (2005) *Famous Last Words (2007) *The Show Must Go (2009) *Storms (2011) *Wild Life (2013) *Hello (2015) *Cageless (2017) == References == Category:Musical groups established in 2003 Category:Pop punk bands
title: Hedley (band)
